description:
Operators will often have a need to fine grain control over what actions are allowed on an extension. For cells, potentially destructive (as in when done mistakenly) actions should have better access/policy control.

The following actions therefore should get better policy control on cells extensions.

-Create
-Delete
-Update
title: Allow fine grained control on cells actions
